name: The Mirage : Illusion of wish
description: There is a man who wants to save a daughter who is dying from an incurable disease. Then one day an unknown person appeared and talked. When you arrive at the end of the world he has created, you can make a wish. What is the ending of this story in a strange world?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: i5-2500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
